General.Name: Heidelberger Beteiligungsholding AG
General.Description: Heidelberger Beteiligungsholding AG operates as an investment company in Germany. It primarily invests in listed securities. The company is based in Heidelberg, Germany. Heidelberger Beteiligungsholding AG operates as a subsidiary of Deutsche Balaton AG.

0.Name: Mr. Ralph  Bieneck
0.Title: CEO & Member of the Management Board
